title: 15 Iconic Flavor Bases from Around the World
description:
This video highlights 15 Iconic Flavor Bases that form the foundation of various cuisines from around the world. From the classic French Mirepoix to the Spanish Sofrito, understanding these essential building blocks is the key to creating authentic and delicious regional dishes.

NOTE: these are specific flavor bases and do not represent all aspects of a particular cuisine.
